title: Microsoft complete baseball. - 1995 edition. (PC)
brief_description: Complete baseball gives you comprehensive details on all the past and current Major League players and teams - the records and history of 150 years of exciting baseball action. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: A multimedia PC with a 386SX or higher processor, 4Mb of memory, at least 3Mb of available hard disk space, CD ROM drive,audio board, super VGA monitor, MS-DOS and Windows 3.1 or later, Mouse and speakers.
